mapper.insert: insert into work (workNo, artistNo, artistName, workName, workImg, workType, workTech, workSize, workIntro, workPrice, workForSale, orderNo, workHeight) values (#{workNo}, #{artistNo}, #{artistName}, #{workName}, #{workImg}, #{workType}, #{workTech}, #{workSize}, #{workIntro}, #{workPrice}, #{workForSale}, #{orderNo}, #{workHeight})
mapper.select: select * from work where workNo in (#{workNo})
select * from work where artistNo=#{artistNo} and workForSale=0
select * from work where artistNo=#{artistNo} and workForSale=1
select * from work where artistNo=#{artistNo} and (workForSale=2 or workForSale =3)
mapper.update: update work set workForSale=2, orderNo=#{orderNo} where workNo=#{workNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from work where workForSale=2 or workForSale=3
select * from work where workForSale=2 or workForSale=3 limit #{startrow}, 9
mapper.update: update work set workForSale=3 where workNo=#{workNo}

update work set workName=#{workName}, workImg=#{workImg}, workType=#{workType}, workTech=#{workTech}, workSize=#{workSize}, workIntro=#{workIntro}, workPrice=#{workPrice}, workHeight=#{workHeight} where workNo=#{workNo}
